title: Friend banned
body:
So my friend's account was permanently suspended and the message/reason has been sent to his email. Thing is, it was a mail only made for league and he can't remember the mail now...

We can't even see what he was banned for and we were just casually playing together and suddenly it was banned. No int, afk or massively toxic behaviour... what 2 do?

replies.body: Have your friend shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when he can! Be sure he chooses the option "I need help recovering my account" and then we'll be able to go over everything with him there once he's verified as the account creator.
Same thing happened to me now. Riot help us please.
